name: team
description: Interacts with a team in the server. Can onboard and off-board a team.

options.name: action
options.description: The action to be taken on the team

name: join_to_create
description: adds or removes a join to create voice channel from a category

options.name: action
options.description: The action to be taken on the join to create voice channel

options.name: category
options.description: the category the join to create voice channel will be added to or deleted from
